Text:
Hey guys, sorry for the delay in this one. I had 2 choices right now, wait until I could finish seeding my Smallville rip to share this one, or while it was encoding upload Bones for direct download.

So please if you can help seed, use the direct download link in the torrent comment and start seeding as soon as it's done.

If enough of you can help now I can devote all my speed to uploading Smallville now.

Thanks to all the seeders out there with nice fat upload bandwidth, without your help I would be seeding forever! :)
